name: falkordb-fastmcp-client
description: Claude Desktop client for connecting to remote FalkorDB FastMCP proxy servers
long_description: Connect Claude Desktop to remote FalkorDB graph databases through authenticated FastMCP proxy servers. This client provides secure Bearer token authentication and enables access to FalkorDB tools for executing Cypher queries, listing graphs, and managing graph database operations.

tools.name: falkordb_query
tools.description: Execute Cypher queries against FalkorDB graphs

tools.name: falkordb_server_info
tools.description: Get FalkorDB server information and capabilities

proxy_url.title: FastMCP Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: URL of your remote FalkorDB FastMCP proxy server (e.g., https://your-proxy.com:3001/sse/)

bearer_token.title: Bearer Token
bearer_token.description: Authentication token for the FastMCP proxy server
